page.title: 07INFORMATION SYSTEMS Library
page.content: INFORMATION SYSTEMS - Library The library is in the Community Centre which is in the middle of the large shopping complex. There could be more children members and the adult members are mostly elderly. The books that are most popular are fiction. The popular authors were: for the ladies it was Catherine Cookson, for the men Wilbur Smith and for the children, boys and girls, Enid Blyton and Roald Dahl. We were also told that quite a lot of people forget to bring their books back and that a letter is sent. The children have to pay 15p to cover the postage of the letter and adults 7p per day until they bring them back. The busiest day is Tuesday because Monday and Sunday it is not open. It is busier in the Winter than in the Summer. There are 7 staff, 5 of them work part-time.
